query:
SELECT
                r.room_id,
                r.last_seq,
                s.covered_through AS "snap_covered?",
                s.size_bytes AS snap_size
            FROM
                rooms r
                LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
                    SELECT
                        covered_through,
                        octet_length(bytes)::bigint AS size_bytes
                    FROM
                        room_snapshots
                    WHERE
                        room_id = r.room_id
                    ORDER BY
                        covered_through DESC
                    LIMIT 1) s ON TRUE
            WHERE
                r.room_id = $1
